description: TEHRAN – The Atomic Energy Organization of Iran (AEOI) has formally condemned the United States for its "brutal military aggression" against Iran’s civilian nuclear facilities at Natanz, Fordow, and Isfahan.
title: Iran blasts IAEA inaction in formal letter after US strikes on its nuclear facilities

description: TEHRAN – Scores of Iranians filled Tehran's Enghelab Square Sunday evening, several hours after the United States dropped bombs on Iranian nuclear sites.
title: Tehran’s Enghelab Square erupts in fury over U.S. strikes; president joins crowd

description: Fu Cong, China’s Permanent Representative to the United Nations, has described the attack on Iran’s nuclear facilities as a “dangerous precedent.”
title: China calls Israeli strike on Iran's nuclear sites a 'dangerous precedent'

description: TEHRAN - A growing wave of international condemnation has followed the recent U.S. airstrikes on Iran’s nuclear facilities, as countries across West Asia and beyond denounce the move as a dangerous violation of international law that threatens regional and global security.
title: US airstrikes on Iran draw condemnation across West Asia and beyond

description: TEHRAN — In a flagrant violation of international law and the U.S. Constitution, President Donald Trump unilaterally ordered military strikes on Iran’s nuclear facilities at Fordow, Natanz, and Isfahan in the early hours of Sunday, provoking immediate bipartisan condemnation in Congress and warnings of catastrophic regional escalation.
title: 'Trump endangered American forces:' US lawmakers slam president’s strikes on Iran

description: TEHRAN - Mohammad al‑Bukhaiti, a senior political council member of the Ansarallah movement in Yemen, announced that Houthis are coordinating with the “axis of resistance” and are awaiting Iran’s signal on when to launch a response to recent U.S. aggression against Iran.
title: Ansarallah await Iran's decision before responding to US aggression: official

description: TEHRAN - Mohammad al‑Bukhaiti, a senior political council member of the Ansarallah movement in Yemen, announced that Houthis are coordinating with the “axis of resistance” and are awaiting Iran’s signal on when to launch a response to recent U.S. aggression against Iran.
title: Ansarallah await Iran's decision before responding to US Aggression: Official

description: TEHRAN – In a phone conversation on Sunday, Iranian Foreign Minister Seyed Abbas Araghchi and UK Foreign Secretary David Lammy discussed the latest developments following the United States’ military strikes on Iran’s peaceful nuclear facilities.
title: Iran slams US attack as violation of International Law

description: TEHRAN- Two young boys, Taha Behroozi and Alisan Jabbari, both aged seven, were killed by shrapnel from a downed drone in the Azerbaijan Square area of Tabriz during an Israeli military operation.
title: Playtime turned to tragedy: Israeli attack claims lives of two boys in Tabriz

description: TEHRAN – U.S. President Donald Trump did on Sunday what the entire world, most importantly his American voters – had been warning him not to do: He flew U.S. B-2 bombers inside Iran to directly join Israel's war against the country, launching strikes on Iran's nuclear facilities in three locations.
title: US officially enters war, Iran vows: 'You will pay'

description: TEHRAN – In a scathing letter to the UN Secretary-General and Security Council, Iranian Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi condemned the United States’ “blatant military aggression” against Iran’s peaceful nuclear facilities as an unprecedented violation of international law.
title: Araghchi demands global condemnation of US strikes in letter to UN

description: TEHRAN – An Al Jazeera analyst says it is not Iran but the Israeli regime that has a secret nuclear weapons program.
title: It is Israel, not Iran, that has secret nuclear weapons program: analysis

description: BEIRUT — During a Security Council session on Syria, U.S. Ambassador to the United Nations Dorothy Shea called on the Syrian government to take a series of political and security steps, most notably initiating talks with the Israeli entity.
title: Best time for US to impose normalization between Damascus and Tel Aviv

description: TEHRAN – The United Nations Children’s Fund (UNICEF) has warned that kids in Gaza risk dying from thirst after the region’s water systems collapsed.
title: UNICEF issues Gaza warning

description: As United States President Donald Trump lauded what he called the “spectacular military success” of the strikes he authorized against Iran, Democrats were quick to accuse him of overstepping his authority.
title: ‘Patently illegal’: Critics dispute legality of Trump’s Iran strikes

description:
The war has started.
The United States has launched its military campaign against Iran. Behind the scenes, however, lies a chilling truth: many of the Persian Gulf states, Asian investors, and global institutions that have funded this war through U.S. Treasury holdings may now be at risk themselves.
title: Your Treasuries Pay for the Bombs — Get Out While You Can

description: TEHRAN - Arshia Behnezhad and Javad Karimi will likely miss the 2025 Volleyball Nations League (VNL) Week 2.
title: Iran setters Behnezhad and Karimi doubt for 2025 VNL Week 2

description: TEHRAN- Mehdi Ghaffari, a dedicated young wushu athlete from Khorramdarreh, Iran, was martyred in the latest wave of brutal and indiscriminate Israeli airstrikes. His death has sparked widespread grief across the Iranian sports community.
title: Young wushu champion martyred in brutal Israeli airstrikes

description: TEHRAN – Yemen has officially announced that it is joining Iran in the war against Israel and the United States, which began with Israeli attacks on Iranian soil on June 13, and was exaggerated with American airstrikes on Sunday.
title: Yemen says it is entering the war following US strikes on Iran

description: TEHRAN – Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian has strongly condemned the overnight U.S. military strike on parts of Iran’s nuclear facilities, calling it a clear act of aggression and proof that the United States is the main force behind the Israeli regime’s hostile actions against the Islamic Republic.
title: Pezeshkian says US main force behind Israeli aggression

description: TEHRAN – The Commander-in-Chief of Iran’s Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps (IRGC), Major General Mohammad Pakpour, announced that the IRGC’s aerospace operations against the Zionist regime will continue without pause, emphasizing that the attacks have disrupted Israel's sense of security.
title: IRGC commander: Iran aerospace operations will Continue, "no peace for the zionists"

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s Ambassador and Permanent Representative to the United Nations in New York, Sa’eed Iravani, has called for an emergency meeting of the U.N. Security Council (U.N.S.C.) following “premeditated and unprovoked” airstrikes by the United States on three nuclear sites in Iran, urging the council to condemn the attacks in the strongest possible terms.
title: Iran envoy urges UNSC emergency meeting over ‘unprovoked’ US attacks on Iran

description: TEHRAN – In the wake of the United States’ recent bombardment of Iran’s Fordow, Natanz, and Isfahan nuclear facilities, described by President Donald Trump as a “spectacular military success,” a closer look at expert commentary from the Atlantic Council, a prominent American think tank, depicts a far more complex and contradictory picture.
title: Experts’ commentary reveals strategic miscalculations in U.S. strikes on Iran’s nuclear sites

description: TEHRAN –The war imposed by the Zionist regime is not merely a military attack, it is a war against Iran’s scientific progress, as well as academic and intellectual community, according to the head of the Institute for Cultural, Social, and Civilization Studies affiliated with the Ministry of Science, Research and Technology.
title: Israel’s war against Iran, a war on scientific progress: expert

description: The following interview is published on the website of Ministry of Foreign Affairs of People Republic of China.
title: Foreign Ministry Spokesperson’s Remarks on the U.S. Strikes on Iran’s Nuclear Facilities

description: TEHRAN - Marc Botenga, a Belgian member of the European Parliament, has called out the EU for not responding to Israel’s attacks on Iran.
title: Belgian politician slams The EU for not condemning Israel attacking Iran

description: TEHRAN – People from all walks of life launched rallies and protests in India, Pakistan, Iraq, and South Africa, expressing solidarity with Iran, and denouncing Israel’s assault.
title: India, Iraq, Pakistan, South Africa: people condemn Israeli aggression on Iran

description: TEHRAN - Iranian Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi has called on the international community to take an unequivocal stance against the blatant act of military aggression by the United States, warning that the very foundations of international law are now at risk.
title: 'UN Charter Is under attack', Iran FM urges global response after US strike on nuclear sites

description: TEHRAN - In the early hours of Sunday, Iran’s Islamic Revolution Guard Corps (IRGC) launched the 20th wave of Operation True Promise 3 against Israel, with the unprecedented deployment of its third-generation Kheibarshekan ballistic missiles, featuring multiple warheads and advanced terminal guidance systems.
title: Iran hits strategic sites in Israel with multi-warhead Kheibarshekan missiles

description: TEHRAN - The Islamic Revolution Guard Corps (IRGC) has issued a stern warning to the United States following a U.S. airstrike on Iran’s peaceful nuclear facilities, declaring that the aggressors "possess neither initiative nor the ability to escape retaliation."
title: 'They possess neither initiative nor the ability to escape retaliation': IRGC warns US

description: TEHRAN- Iran’s transport and urban development minister ordered expediting the reconstruction of the residential units damaged in the current war.
title: Urban development minister orders expediting reconstruction of damaged residential units

description: TEHRAN--Rescue workers of Iranian Red Crescent Society (IRCS) are those who devote their lives to rescue people. They go deep into the incident to rescue the trapped person without any delay or hesitation. Amir Momeni is one of the rescue workers who speaks about the stressful minutes among the storm and the fire.
title: IRCS member speaks about days of rescue work following Israeli attacks

description: TEHRAN--In the days when the sound of explosions caused by the Zionist regime's aggression has been heard in some cities of Iran, not only the soil of Iran but also the hearts of Iranians have united, so that alongside the hardship and pain of the Zionist regime's blatant aggression against Iranian soil, national solidarity, with all its human manifestations, can once again emerge from the streets and homes.
title: Story of empathy: Iranian people open their homes and hearts

description: TEHRAN - The United States’ Donald Trump ordered attacks on THE Fordo, Natanz and Isfahan facilities in Iran on the early hours of Sunday, June 22.
title: Trump-Netanyahu-Grossi evil triangle plus Merz’s delight

description: TEHRAN – The Iranian Foreign Ministry has issued a statement condemning the brutal military aggression by the United States against Iran’s peaceful nuclear facilities, denouncing the act as an unprecedented violation of international law and a direct assault on Iranian sovereignty.
title: Iran condemns U.S. strike on nuclear facilities as 'criminal act of aggression'

description: TEHRAN- The Netherlands exported non-oil products worth $215 million to Iran during the first two months of the current Iranian calendar year (March 21-May 21), the head of the Islamic Republic of Iran (IRICA) announced.
title: Netherlands exports non-oil products worth $215m to Iran in 2 months

description: TEHRAN-A game developer and conscripted soldier, Seyyed Hamidreza Maktabi, attained the honor of martyrdom while bravely defending the nation against Zionist aggression.
title: Iranian game developer martyred in defense of homeland against Zionist aggression

description: TEHRAN- A professor from the Tajik International University of Foreign Languages 'Sotim Ulughzoda' expressed confidence that the ongoing conflict will end with a victory of light over darkness, led by Iran, and that the world will once again embrace the culture of peace and construction inherent in the Iranian people.
title: Iran will triumph over darkness, restoring faith in its peaceful culture, Tajik scholar says

description: TEHRAN- The Art and Cultural Organization of Tehran Municipality has launched a storytelling initiative titled "Storytelling Mothers" to help children connect with important human values.
title: Tehran Municipality launches storytelling initiative to inspire children with tales of Iran's heroes

description: TEHRAN - The head of Tehran’s Chamber of Guilds said Iran’s supply of essential goods exceeds domestic demand and stressed there is no concern over shortages, even in the capital where conditions are more sensitive.
title: Essential goods supply exceeds demand, no shortage expected: Tehran guilds chief

description: TEHRAN - Iran’s Minister of Industry, Mining and Trade said on Saturday that the country’s industrial and commercial sectors are fully prepared to support both the public and military during the current conflict, and stressed the importance of maintaining normal production flows across the country.
title: Industry ministry vows full support for public, military needs amid war

description: TEHRAN - Iran’s Energy Minister Abbas Aliabadi said that the country’s water and electricity services continue without disruption despite ongoing attacks, and praised utility workers for maintaining operations even during times of bombardment.
title: Iran’s water, power services continue uninterrupted amid conflict: minister

description: TEHRAN - The head of Iran Chamber of Commerce, Industries, Mines and Agriculture (ICCIMA) said on Saturday that Iran’s domestic market has been effectively managed through cooperation between the public, private sector, and the government, stressing that businesses consider support for citizens during this crisis a national duty.
title: Iran’s markets stable, businesses fully mobilized, says ICCIMA head

description: TEHRAN - The Department of Environment has strongly condemned the recent attacks by the Zionist regime on fossil fuel storage facilities as deliberate creation of environmental crises and a clear violation of international principles and commitments to environmental protection.
title: DOE slams Israeli attacks as ‘deliberate creation of environmental crises’

description: TEHRAN- Ammar Hakim, leader of the Iraqi National Wisdom Movement, expressed deep regret and strongly condemned the attack in response to the U.S. strike on the Islamic Republic of Iran.
title: Hakim: Attack on Iran may lead the world to an all-out war

description: TEHRAN – No respite for the Israeli regime’s infantry in Gaza as Palestinian resistance strikes occupation forces again.
title: Occupation forces caught in ambush

description: BEIRUT — At an existential crossroads, Hezbollah stands in defence of its symbol and backbone in Tehran. However, the decision to directly engage in the battle is not a simple one, neither politically nor militarily, given that the U.S.-led Israeli aggression against Lebanon has stripped some of its defensive capabilities.
title: Lebanon is not safe from Zionist-American evasion

description: TEHRAN – In a commentary Middle East Eye said Tel Aviv rulers have unintentionally provided Iran with a “powerful political gift” by uniting Iranians against a “common enemy” called Israel.
title: Iranians rally around the flag: commentary

description: TEHRAN – The U.S.-backed Israeli genocidal campaign kills many more Palestinians amid international inaction.
title: Over 100 killed in Gaza

description: BEIRUT—Hezbollah Secretary-General Sheikh Naim Qassem has emphasized that Hezbollah does not remain neutral between Iran’s legitimate rights and the American and Israeli deceits.
title: We are not neutral despite U.S. pressure, Hezbollah confirms

description: TEHRAN - The Council on American-Islamic Relations (CAIR), the largest Muslim civil rights and advocacy organization in the United States, has strongly condemned the recent U.S. military strike on Iran, labeling it an “illegal and unjustified act of war” that prioritizes the interests of Israel’s government over those of the American people.
title: CAIR condemns U.S. attack on Iran as ‘illegal and unjustified act of war’

description: TEHRAN - The Palestinian resistance group Hamas has issued a strong condemnation of recent U.S. airstrikes targeting Iranian nuclear facilities, calling the military action a dangerous and unlawful escalation.
title: Hamas strongly condemns U.S. airstrikes on Iranian nuclear facilities
Tel Aviv... Not Gaza

description: TEHRAN– The Atomic Energy Organization of Iran (AEOI) has issued a statement after the attack on the country's nuclear sites.
title: AEOI issues statement after attack on Iran nuclear sites

description: TEHRAN– The US President claims that Washington targeted three Iranian nuclear sites.
title: Trump claims attacking Iran's nuclear facilities
